specs:capability.name: E2E traffic confidentiality, integrity and authenticity protection
specs:capability.description: Capability of ensuring data-in-motion confidentiality, integrity and authenticity between two or more communicating actors

specs:NISTsecurityControl.name: TRANSMISSION CONFIDENTIALITY AND INTEGRITY - SC-8
specs:NISTsecurityControl.nist:description: The information system protects the [Selection (one or more): confidentiality; integrity] of transmitted information.

specs:NISTsecurityControl.name: CRYPTOGRAPHIC KEY ESTABLISHMENT AND MANAGEMENT - SC-12
specs:NISTsecurityControl.nist:description: The organization establishes and manages cryptographic keys for required cryptography employed within the information system in accordance with [Assignment: organization-defined requirements for key generation, distribution, storage, access, and destruction].

specs:NISTsecurityControl.name: CRYPTOGRAPHIC PROTECTION - SC-13
specs:NISTsecurityControl.nist:description: The information system implements [Assignment: organization-defined cryptographic uses and type of cryptography required for each use] in accordance with applicable federal laws, Executive Orders, directives, policies, regulations, and standards.

specs:NISTsecurityControl.name: PUBLIC KEY INFRASTRUCTURE CERTIFICATES - SC-17
specs:NISTsecurityControl.nist:description: The organization issues public key certificates under an [Assignment: organization-defined certificate policy] or obtains public key certificates from an approved service provider.

specs:capability.name: CRYPTOCURRENCY MINING DETECTION IN 5G NETWORK TRAFFIC
specs:capability.description: Capability of detecting cryptocurrency mining in 5G network traffic

specs:NISTsecurityControl.name: BEHAVIOR ANALYSIS - IR-4(13)
specs:NISTsecurityControl.nist:description: Analyze anomalous or suspected adversarial behavior in or related to organization-defined environments or resources.

specs:NISTsecurityControl.name: CONTINUOUS MONITORING - CA-7
specs:NISTsecurityControl.nist:description: The organization develops a continuous monitoring strategy and implements a continuous monitoring program, which includes the selection of proper metrics, the definition of a monitoring frequency, the establishment of response actions to address results of the analysis of security-related information and the reporting of the security status with a defined frequency.

specs:NISTsecurityControl.name: INFORMATION SYSTEM MONITORING - SI-4
specs:NISTsecurityControl.nist:description: The organization monitors the information system to detect attacks and indicators of potential attacks in accordance with a defined monitoring objectives and unauthorized local, network, and remote connections. It identifies unauthorized use of the information system and deploys proper monitoring tools to collect information about the system.

specs:capability.name: 5G SYSTEM DDOS DETECTION AND MITIGATION
specs:capability.description: Capability of detecting, reacting to - preventing if possible - security attacks aimed at distrupting a system's availability

specs:NISTsecurityControl.name: DENIAL OF SERVICE PROTECTION - SC-5
specs:NISTsecurityControl.nist:description: The information system protects against or limits the effects of denial of service attacks by employing proper security safeguards.

specs:NISTsecurityControl.name: DENIAL OF SERVICE PROTECTION - SC-5(3)
specs:NISTsecurityControl.nist:description: The information system protects against or limits the effects of denial of service attacks by employing proper security safeguards.

specs:NISTsecurityControl.name: CONTINUOUS MONITORING - CA-7
specs:NISTsecurityControl.nist:description: The organization develops a continuous monitoring strategy and implements a continuous monitoring program, which includes the selection of proper metrics, the definition of a monitoring frequency, the establishment of response actions to address results of the analysis of security-related information and the reporting of the security status with a defined frequency.

specs:NISTsecurityControl.name: INFORMATION SYSTEM MONITORING - SI-4
specs:NISTsecurityControl.nist:description: The organization monitors the information system to detect attacks and indicators of potential attacks in accordance with a defined monitoring objectives and unauthorized local, network, and remote connections. It identifies unauthorized use of the information system and deploys proper monitoring tools to collect information about the system.

specs:enumItem.specs:description: ChaCha20 stream cipher with Poly1305 MAC
No specific integrity protection; may be provided by an authenticated encryption algorithm already (AEAD), e.g. CCM, GCM, Poly1305... See DATA_ENCRYPTION_ALGORITHM metric.

specs:MetricDefinition.specs:definition: Throughput of traffic handled by the Network Traffic Analysis enabler (bytes per second). Related to MSPL monitoringConfigurationCondition/maxCount element. To be clarified by UMU
Throughput of traffic handled by the Network Traffic Analysis enabler (bytes per second). Related to MSPL monitoringConfigurationCondition/maxCount element. To be clarified by UMU
